data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zúñiga-Reinoso, Álvaro, Cid-Arcos, Mauricio (2015): A new species of Callyntra (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae) from central Chile. Zootaxa 4000 (2): 294-298, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4000.2.8
